name.description:
Cluster Policy name requested by the user. This has to be unique. Length must be between 1 and 100
characters.

policy_family_id.description: Additional human-readable description of the cluster policy.

policy_family_definition_overrides.description:
ID of the policy family. The cluster policy's policy definition inherits the policy
family's policy definition.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

429.description: Operation is rejected due to throttling, e.g. some resource has been exhausted, per-user quota.

post.description: Creates a new policy with prescribed settings.
